last_episode_to_air.name: Gabriel's Voice
last_episode_to_air.overview: As LA County assesses the cracks of a broken system, the jury reaches a verdict in Isauro's case, and Pearl Fernandez has her day in court.

name: The Trials of Gabriel Fernandez
overview: A boy’s brutal murder and the public trials of his guardians and social workers prompt questions about the system’s protection of vulnerable children.
tagline: A tragedy that outraged a community. A failure that shocked the system.

episodes.name: A Shock to the System
episodes.overview: Dark details of Gabriel's story come to light as a shadowy source from inside the DCFS suggests that his case wasn't handled properly.

episodes.name: Evil in this Courtroom
episodes.overview: With hundreds of witnesses and thousands of documents, the trial of Isauro Aguirre begins — with Deputy DA Jonathan Hatami seeking the death penalty.

episodes.name: Failure at All Levels
episodes.overview: Focus shifts to Gabriel's mother, Pearl, and the role she may have played in his death. Gabriel's teacher recounts a series of calls to child services.

episodes.name: Death Has Got Him by the Hand
episodes.overview: At Isauro's trial, a former security guard details his attempts to help Gabriel that hit a dead end with social services and the sheriff's department.

episodes.name: Improper Regard or Indifference
episodes.overview: The social workers fight to clear their names in court. Later, with the cameras turned off, Gabriel's siblings take the stand and give graphic testimony.

episodes.name: Gabriel's Voice
episodes.overview: As LA County assesses the cracks of a broken system, the jury reaches a verdict in Isauro's case, and Pearl Fernandez has her day in court.
